variables.systemDescription: SGB-MSU1 is a modification for emulating the Super Game Boy (SGB) that adds the functionality of the MSU-1 enhancement chip. This allows for custom, high-quality audio to be played in a Game Boy game, as it uses external PCM audio files instead of the original sound hardware. This modification is supported on devices like SD2SNES/FXPAK Pro flash carts and some MiSTer FPGA cores.
